values:
i'm a local but a foreinger. still the addict yet i'm sober. still the body with the coroner.  
many friends yet still a loner.
you're the pillow-the cool side.  the sand during high tide. the cocktail poolside. 
the water when clouds collide.
from the inside out, we were formed. and from the inside out, we will fall


I miss you I miss you I miss you I miss you I miss seeing you I miss talking to you I miss being in your company You were always such great company I miss hanging out I miss doing nothing with you I miss our good times I miss our bad times.  
I miss you.

You can ask me any 4 questions you would like
I will answer in all honesty... ANY 4 questions

And if you feel up to the challenge, and are truly an honest person like me, repost this so people can ask you questions
you'll get some interesting responses

I just... don't... understand.  I don't understand.  Actually, I do understand.  I understand that you're all effing crazy.  Every last sodding one of you is absolutely mad.  Does no one else fucking speak English?  ENGLISH, right here... can't you read?! can't you listen?!  Every word I type was taught to me... I'm not making them up, I swear.  

It feels like... people just enjoy playing a casual game of "can't quite reach it" with me... every chance they get.  "Hey look... this is what you want, isn't it?  This is what you've been waiting and hoping for, right?  Well here it is!  Just kidding... you can't have it.  But wait... you can look at it for a while if you'd like."

I feel fake.  I'm not fake, but I feel fake.  It kills to be so nice and friendly to the people I secretly loath- the people I wish I could aviod forever and eventually forget.  Why can't I show emotion unless I'm hiding behind a computer?  Why can't I just let everyone know who I passionately love or passionately hate?  Does insincere friendliness make me a good person?  or does it make me fake?  I could hate you and you would never know.  How frustrating.  


I wish I could read minds... just for a day.  I'd love to see who else is holding out on everyone.  Does everyone else love and hate in secret too?
HebrewHammer0187: dont worry, jesus will save you

HAHAHA I won't even bother writing an entry for this, because I already posted an entry word-for-word what I would write now.  

Thank you for throwing some sense at my ass AGAIN.  I really appreciate it.  I really appreciate you.

"...Oh, well umm... Trial by fire, right?  It's good for you."

She's right.  It's trial by fire.  This is good for me.  
It's straight as hell, don't even worry about it.

Someone calling me a great person shouldn't make me cry, but it did.  

What was the point of this?  Seriously.  I guess trust is elusive, because it's already gone.  

Why do I bother?  

I don't care.  I don't care I don't care.  I just hate being completely left to myself.  Sometimes I wonder if I'm actually here.

"The only part that really gets me about this is that there was no cause...no leading up to it. It just was. It's here, but is it actually what I think it is?

I can't even seem to find the right words to say anymore. Is it the company? Or moreso the feeling that is brought?

But in the end it wont matter anyway, because in the end is only destruction, a place I seem to love to visit, even when it is self-made. Endings can be put off if I can halt the beginnings of this. A stop sign, in a way, forming a wall to keep safe. And that is what I shall do. That is what I shall make, to stop me from making anything else."

 

And now it's me who's putting herself on the line to be broken. I volunteer.  Ask me why.  Go on, ask me.  It's because the potential of something, to me, is worth the risk of being broken.  So now it's me speaking directly to you.  There shouldn't be a doubt in your mind that I'm talking to you.  This is me telling you that I want this.  I'm risking being shot down.  I'm risking being rejected.  I'm the one not thinking of concequences or the ends. 

And I'm saying all of this after reading what you wrote to me.  I'm typing this KNOWING that you don't want this.  KNOWING that you want to stop this before it starts.  But I'm still typing this.  Ask me why.  Go on, ask me.  It's because the potential of something, to me, is worth the risk of being broken. 

This is trust.  I trust you.  You've never given me an outstanding reason to trust you with my entire person, but I do. 

You probobly weren't even talking be about me. I desparately wish you were. 

Okay, Love.  It's your move.

There's this feeling in my throat; I used to call it compassion.  Now I feel it in my chest.  I call it a mix between loneliness and strife.  I know exactly what's wrong with me.  This is black and white... or more to the point, black and blue.  I just want to speak.
    I   want   to   find   the   right   words,   and   use   them   to   strangle   the   first   person   willing   to   listen.    
I struggle to give words and I struggle to accept them.  Some people make it look so easy... to crush someone without even trying... or to win someone over without even trying, all with only words.  Simple, cheap, insincere words.

That's what I am, I'm strangled in all the terrible words I'm given, without the ability to share them.  Without the opportunity to share them.  Without the courage or articulation to share them.  
Someone please take a good look at me so I can talk to you.

No more school!! no more school.  And yet, it's a bitter-sweet weekend.  <3 Stephie.  It makes me extremely sad how much steph's been blowing me off the last few weeks.  Extremely sad.  I'm terrible at goodbyes; I'll probobly just end up crying my eyes out on her shoulder.
It also makes me sad that I don't have any plans for tonight... I mean, come on.  It's the last day of school... why I am sitting at home by myself?

No more school, no more violin, no more piano, no more suzuki, no more orchestra... 

...now I need something to do with this new found freedom.

So... debate exam was fun.  Yeah.  No school tomorrow.  Fun. anyway...

------------edit--------------------------------------------

*warning: the following may contain pathetic, melodramatic content.  Please proceed with caution.*

wtf... what the fuck just happened?
 


I can't be sure, but, by the way it looks, when I'm in your grace, my tongue refuses to articulate, and my mind scrambles to over-compensate.  I end up stumbling over a few trite words that lack any eloquence I may or may not posses.  Even online... even when I'm hiding behind a computer, I can't grasp words.  If words and expressions were tangible I'd just hand them to you to interpret and do with as you please.  I'm lacking something that makes people witty and interesting; I wish I knew what.
  
I'm nervous, but I'm not sure what I'm nervous about.
The more I try to avoid hesitation, the longer it takes me to act.  

...but everyone has their flaws, right?  I can't possibly have THAT many points marked down for pettiness, insecurity, and lack of social grace, can I?  



Remind me why I'm depending on someone else to determine my self worth.  This is what I asked for, I'm just afraid of fucking it up before it even exists.

I don't even know why I bother sometimes.  I can't even hold a fucking 10 minute conversation with an acquaintance to save my life.  I have thoughts and ideas, but apparently not enough courage to carry them out.  I suck.  
I have two gorgeous, long-stem roses rotting my sister's car as proof.   Emily sucks.  
Someone please teach me how to conduct myself like a human being.

I really don't know what's been wrong with me lately.  Is it so terrible to just want company?  Is it so terrible to want to have some sort of effect on other people? perhaps to matter to them?  for people to know your name? or heaven forbid... call you to chat?  Fuck social grace.  Fuck band.  There's one thing I won't miss this summer... damn band class to hell.
Yeah, I guess I'm whinning again.  If you read this, go read something else.

I have so much to say right now, but I also have no way to say it.  A complete cut-off of my acess to expressive speech and writing, so, here I am struggling to tell you that I can't tell you want I want to tell you.  I'm refering to the 2nd person plural with the word "you", but, in fact, speaking mostly to my Angie, who does not read my journal.  
Since when have I been incapable of communicating with my best friends?

Damn charming people.  Damn people who can win over a person's affection with words and wit.  

I hate that feeling... the one at the end of a debate round where you you're waiting for the judge to tell you which side won and lost.  You see them looking over their flows and ballet... thinking it through... the feeling where you're not sure if you were better, but it was your best.  You know you're probobly going to get voted down, but you can't help but hope you've won. 
It's one thing to get voted down on an off day, it's another to just not be good enough.  

I think that's a pretty okay metaphor, actually... 

I'd like to think I'm more open and articulate... that I can be more smooth and charming. However, that was my best.

Do I hear the hollow sound, footsteps resounding on this frozen ground, or the familiar disappointment of the echoes of my own? 
Somehow I ended up here in between, where there is always the comfort of knowing I'll never be seen when I fall. I wait for just one touch and I fall. Weightless, endless, faithless, I'll adore you. A single touch before I fade. Painless let me pass through.

"Emily? Tomorrow walk as slow as you can."
"...Why?"
::momentary awkward staring::
"Because I was taking steps taller than you are and I still couldn't catch up to you."

I'm so jealous of people. I wish I could effect someone as much as they effect me.

Yesterday, someone told me that they liked my confidence. They. Liked. My. Confidence. MY confidence. That's one of the best compliments I've ever gotten.  
Confidence.  Now there's a frightening word.  

Vicky, you make me feel insecure. 

Steph, please please please don't leave me.  Please? I have no idea what I'd do with out you. 15 days.  Holy hell what am I going to do without you?

Melissa, you're really nice.

Yoni, Adam, and Katie, thanks for letting me sit with you guys.  It almost felt like I had band friends.

Angela, where the hell are you?

Addres full doubt you've ever felt frustration well I'm choking on it now
And it's the hardest thing for me to shake

Is it because of this vacancy that you swear never to believe?

Honestly honest me, with a look that's so deceiving
I'll bite, chew, swallow, and digest the hands that feed me
With a bayonet for a tongue,
Swallow swords inadvertently,
And to the organ flame I'll maintain a close adjacency

I have so many themes; I would love to explain to you
Farewell to all the days you were, within my reach,

and as of right now everything is making perfect sense.

I've called you so many times today
And I guess it's all true what your girlfriends say
That you don't ever want to see me again
And your brother's gonna kill me and he's six feet ten
I guess you'd call it cowardice
But I'm not prepared to go on like this

I can't stand losing you

I see you've sent my letters back
And my LP records and they're all scratched
I can't see the point in another day
When nobody listens to a word I say
You can call it lack of confidence
But to carry on living doesn't make no sense

I can't stand losing you

I guess this is our last goodbye
And you don't care so I won't cry
But you'll be sorry when I'm dead
And all this guilt will be on your head
I guess you'd call it suicide
But I'm too full to swallow my pride

I can't stand losing you

As it tunrs out, someone did find me.  


...and the plot thickens.

When one has enough faith and trust in another individual to swallow his/her insecurities and proclaim love for that individual, one generally does not hope for a reply like "It's alittle late to say that."  

But that's only generally speaking.  

I really don't want to go to school tomorrow.  I don't want to make eye contact with anyone. I feel like I've been cut open and everyone can see my thoughts exactly how they are; I feel like I have no facade; I feel like people can see straight through me.

This, however, in reality, is not the case. I have not confided in any one of my friends.  Any one, save Kim. Why is that? The truth is that, as horrible as it sounds, I know Kim would be the only person to take me seriously.  I am blessed by my friends, but they wouldn't take me seriously. 
Goddamn wall.

The new favorite word(s):
Pine:
Verb
intr. 1. To feel a lingering, often nostalgic desire.

nostalgic:
Noun
1. A bittersweet longing for things, persons, or situations of the past. 

This is getting old... someone please come find me and drag me out of here.

So here's what I've come up with so far:

Relationships are like shirts.  Allow me to explain.
Sometimes... you find a shirt that's pretty on the rack, but once you put it on, it doesn't really fit right, so you take it off.

Sometimes... you find a shirt that fits perfectly, that you're comfortable in, so you never want to take it off.

Sometimes... the shirts you wear to much get holes in them because the fabric isn't strong enough, so as much as you liked it, you have to take it off.

Sometimes... shirts fit well but are too tight around the neck and you can't breath when you wear them, so you try to unbutton them alittle.

Sometimes... shirts that are tight around the neck don't have buttons, so as hard as you try and as much as you want it, you eventually have to take it off.

I thought I was in love, but maybe I just don't know the difference between love and comfort.  I wrote a text message one night... and it said "Thank you so much.  I love you." I didn't send it.  I didn't have the guts.  It's a little ironic to know that he may have been thinking the same thing. I just wish my shirt had buttons.  I would have loved to undo a few buttons before I took it off and some other girl put it on.  Well, to me, it was unbuttoning a few buttons, and I loved it.  I loved being IN a relationship and not bound to a relationship.  But as it turns out, I wasn't in the relationship, I only thought I was, because to him, I wasn't unbuttoning, I was taking it off.  That, of course, was my fault. 

I'm not going to ask to put it back on... mainly because he'd say no. He made that quite clear the other night. Also because I'm inconsiderate, but not THAT inconsiderate.  I deserve this.  I deserve this.  I really, really deserve this. Love. Damn. Love. Love. Do I really deserve this?

I'm sorry, love.  I hope you read this and know that you've impacted someone as much, no, more than they've impacted you.  Love.  I know I deserve this.
